 1911:                   exit(HugeListBin)
 1912:           end),
 1913:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1914: 
 1915:     io:format("~n** distributed monitor down **~n~n", []),
 1916:     {ok, _Peer3, N3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1917:     monitor_node(N3, true),
 1918:     Go1 = make_ref(),
 1919:     LP1 = spawn(fun () ->
 1920:                         receive Go1 -> ok end,
 1921:                         exit(HugeBin)
 1922:                 end),
 1923:     _ = spawn(N3,
 1924:                fun () ->
 1925:                        _ = erlang:monitor(process, LP1),
 1926:                        LP1 ! Go1,
 1927:                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 1928:                end),
 1929:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1930: 
 1931:     {ok, _Peer4, N4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1932:     monitor_node(N4, true),
 1933:     Go2 = make_ref(),
 1934:     LP2 = spawn(fun () ->
 1935:                         receive Go2 -> ok end,
 1936:                         exit(HugeListBin)
 1937:                 end),
 1938:     _ = spawn(N4,
 1939:               fun () ->
 1940:                       _ = erlang:monitor(process, LP2),
 1941:                       LP2 ! Go2,
 1942:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 1943:               end),
 1944:     receive {nodedown, N4} -> ok end,
 1945:     ok.
 1946: 
 1947: -define(COOKIE, '').
 1948: -define(DOP_LINK,		1).
 1949: -define(DOP_SEND,		2).
 1950: -define(DOP_EXIT,		3).
 1951: -define(DOP_UNLINK,		4).
 1952: -define(DOP_REG_SEND,		6).
 1953: -define(DOP_GROUP_LEADER,	7).
 1954: -define(DOP_EXIT2,		8).
 1955: 
 1956: -define(DOP_SEND_TT,		12).
 1957: -define(DOP_EXIT_TT,		13).
 1958: -define(DOP_REG_SEND_TT,	16).
 1959: -define(DOP_EXIT2_TT,		18).
 1960: 
 1961: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P,		19).
 1962: -define(DOP_DEMONITOR_P,	20).
 1963: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,	21).
 1964: 
 1965: -define(DOP_SEND_SENDER, 22).
 1966: -define(DOP_SEND_SENDER_TT, 23).
 1967: 
 1968: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT, 24).
 1969: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT_TT, 25).
 1970: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2, 26).
 1971: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2_TT, 27).
 1972: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_MONITOR_P_EXIT, 28).
 1973: 
 1974: -define(DOP_SPAWN_REQUEST, 29).
 1975: 
 1976: start_monitor(Offender,P) ->
 1977:     Parent = self(),
 1978:     Q = spawn(Offender,
 1979:               fun () ->
 1980:                       Ref = erlang:monitor(process,P),
 1981:                       Parent ! {self(),ref,Ref},
 1982:                       receive
 1983:                           just_stay_alive -> ok
 1984:                       end
 1985:               end),
 1986:     Res = receive
 1987:               {Q,ref,R} ->
 1988:                   {Q, R}
 1989:           after  5000 ->
 1990:                      error
 1991:           end,
 1992:     io:format("Res is ~p~n",[Res]),
 1993:     Res.
 1994: start_link(Offender,P) ->
 1995:     Parent = self(),
 1996:     Q = spawn(Offender,
 1997:               fun () ->
 1998:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 1999:                       link(P),
 2000:                       Parent ! {self(),ref,P},
 2001:                       receive
 2002:                           just_stay_alive -> ok
 2003:                       end
 2004:               end),
 2005:     Res = receive
 2006:               {Q,ref,R} ->
 2007:                   R
 2008:           after  5000 ->
 2009:                      error
 2010:           end,
 2011:     io:format("Res is ~p~n",[Res]),
 2012:     Res.
 2013: 
 2014: %% Test dist messages with valid structure (binary to term ok) but malformed control content
 2015: bad_dist_structure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2016:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
 2017: 
 2018:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2019:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2020:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2021:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2022:     Parent = self(),
 2023:     P = spawn(Victim,
 2024:               fun () ->
 2025:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 2026:                       Parent ! {self(), started},
 2027:                       receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2028:                       bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([one,
 2029:                                                   two]),
 2030:                       Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2031:                       receive done -> ok end
 2032:               end),
 2033:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2034:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2035:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2036:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2037:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2038:     P ! one,
 2039:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2040: 
 2041:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2042:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,'replace',P,normal,normal},2),
 2043: 
 2044:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2045:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_LINK},0),
 2046: 
 2047:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2048:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,'replace'},2),
 2049: 
 2050:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2051:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,'replace',make_ref()},2),
 2052: 
 2053:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2054:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,make_ref(),P},0),
 2055: 
 2056:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2057:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,normal,normal},0),
 2058: 
 2059:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2060:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P,'replace',P},2),
 2061: 
 2062:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2063:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2064: 
 2065:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2066:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_DEMONITOR_P,'replace',P},2),
 2067: 
 2068:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2069:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_DEMONITOR_P,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2070: 
 2071:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT,'replace',P},2),
 2072:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT,make_ref(),normal,normal},0),
 2073:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT_TT,'replace',token,P},2),
 2074:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT_TT,make_ref(),token,normal,normal},0),
 2075:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2,'replace',P},2),
 2076:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2,make_ref(),normal,normal},0),
 2077:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2_TT,'replace',token,P},2),
 2078:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2_TT,make_ref(),token,normal,normal},0),
 2079:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace'},2),
 2080:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace','atomic'},2),
 2081:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace',P},0),
 2082:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND_TT,'replace','',name},2,{message}),
 2083:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND_TT,'replace','',name,token},0,{message}),
 2084:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace',''},2,{message}),
 2085:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',P},0,{message}),
 2086:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',name},0,{message}),
 2087:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',name,{token}},2,{message}),
 2088:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND_TT,'',P},0,{message}),
 2089:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND_TT,'',name,token},0,{message}),
 2090:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,''},0,{message}),
 2091:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,'',name},0,{message}),
 2092:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,'',P,{token}},0,{message}),
 2093:     P ! two,
 2094:     P ! check_msgs,
 2095:     receive
 2096:         {P, messages_checked} -> ok
 2097:     after 5000 ->
 2098:               exit(victim_is_dead)
 2099:     end,
 2100: 
 2101:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2102:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2103: 
 2104:     unlink(P),
 2105:     P ! done,
 2106:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2107:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim),
 2108:     ok.
 2109: 
 2110: %% Test various dist fragmentation errors
 2111: bad_dist_fragments(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2112:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
 2113: 
 2114:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2115:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2116:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2117: 
 2118:     Msg = iolist_to_binary(dmsg_ext(lists:duplicate(255,255))),
 2119: 
 2120:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2121:     Parent = self(),
 2122:     P = spawn(Victim,
 2123:               fun () ->
 2124:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 2125:                       Parent ! {self(), started},
 2126:                       receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2127:                       bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([one,
 2128:                                                   two]),
 2129:                       Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2130:                       receive done -> ok end
 2131:               end),
 2132:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2133:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2134:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2135:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2136:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2137:     P ! one,
 2138: 
 2139:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2140:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2141:                       [{frg, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2142: 
 2143:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2144:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2145:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)},
 2146:                        {frg, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2147: 
 2148:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2149:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2150:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)},
 2151:                        {hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)}]),
 2152: 
 2153:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2154:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P,broken},3,
 2155:                       [{hdr, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2156: 
 2157:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2158:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2159:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)},
 2160:                        close]),
 2161: 
 2162:     ExitVictim = spawn(Victim, fun() ->
 2163:                                        receive
 2164:                                            {link, Proc} ->
 2165:                                                link(Proc),
 2166:                                                Parent ! {self(), linked}
 2167:                                        end,
 2168:                                        receive ok -> ok end
 2169:                                end),
 2170:     OP1 = start_link(Offender,ExitVictim),
 2171:     ExitVictim ! {link, OP1},
 2172:     receive {ExitVictim, linked} -> ok end,
 2173:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, ExitVictim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT,OP1,ExitVictim},0,
 2174:                       [{hdr, 1, [131]}]),
 2175: 
 2176:     Exit2Victim = spawn(Victim, fun() -> receive ok -> ok end end),
 2177:     {OP2, _} = start_monitor(Offender,Exit2Victim),
 2178:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, Exit2Victim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2,OP2,Exit2Victim},0,
 2179:                       [{hdr, 1, [132]}]),
 2180: 
 2181:     DownVictim = spawn(Victim, fun() ->
 2182:                                        receive
 2183:                                            {monitor, Proc} ->
 2184:                                                DR = erlang:monitor(process, Proc),
 2185:                                                Parent ! {self(), DR}
 2186:                                        end,
 2187:                                        Parent ! {self, DR},
 2188:                                        receive ok -> ok end
 2189:                                end),
 2190:     {OP3, _} = start_monitor(Offender,DownVictim),
 2191:     DownVictim ! {monitor, OP3},
 2192:     DownRef = receive {DownVictim, DR} -> DR end,
 2193:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, DownVictim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_MONITOR_P_EXIT,OP3,DownVictim,DownRef},0,
 2194:                       [{hdr, 1, [133]}]),
 2195: 
 2196:     P ! two,
 2197:     P ! check_msgs,
 2198:     receive
 2199:         {P, messages_checked} -> ok
 2200:     after 5000 ->
 2201:               exit(victim_is_dead)
 2202:     end,
 2203: 
 2204:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2205:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2206: 
 2207:     unlink(P),
 2208:     P ! done,
 2209:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2210:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim),
 2211:     ok.
 2212: 
 2213: dmsg_frag_hdr(Frag) ->
 2214:     dmsg_frag_hdr(erlang:phash2(self()), Frag).
 2215: dmsg_frag_hdr(Seq, Frag) ->
 2216:     [131, $E, uint64_be(Seq), uint64_be(Frag), 0].
 2217: 
 2218: dmsg_frag(Frag) ->
 2219:     dmsg_frag(erlang:phash2(self()), Frag).
 2220: dmsg_frag(Seq, Frag) ->
 2221:     [131, $F, uint64_be(Seq), uint64_be(Frag)].
 2222: 
 2223: send_bad_fragments(Offender,VictimNode,Victim,Ctrl,WhereToPutSelf,Fragments) ->
 2224:     Parent = self(),
 2225:     Done = make_ref(),
 2226:     ct:pal("Send: ~p",[Fragments]),
 2227:     spawn_link(Offender,
 2228:           fun () ->
 2229:                   Node = node(Victim),
 2230:                   pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2231:                   erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 2232:                   DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2233:                   Ctrl1 = case WhereToPutSelf of
 2234:                              0 ->
 2235:                                  Ctrl;
 2236:                              N when N > 0 ->
 2237:                                  setelement(N,Ctrl,self())
 2238:                          end,
 2239: 
 2240:                   FragData = [case Type of
 2241:                                   hdr ->
 2242:                                       [dmsg_frag_hdr(FragId),
 2243:                                        dmsg_ext(Ctrl1), FragPayload];
 2244:                                   frg ->
 2245:                                       [dmsg_frag(FragId), FragPayload]
 2246:                               end || {Type, FragId, FragPayload} <- Fragments],
 2247: 
 2248:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> exit("premature nodedown")
 2249:                   after 10 -> ok
 2250:                   end,
 2251: 
 2252:                   [ dctrl_send(DCtrl, D) || D <- FragData ],
 2253:                   [ erlang:port_close(DCtrl) || close <- Fragments],
 2254: 
 2255:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok
 2256:                   after 5000 -> exit("missing nodedown")
 2257:                   end,
 2258:                   Parent ! {FragData,Done}
 2259:           end),
 2260:     receive
 2261:         {WhatSent,Done} ->
 2262:             io:format("Offender sent ~p~n",[WhatSent]),
 2263:             verify_nc(VictimNode),
 2264:             ok
 2265:     after 7000 ->
 2266:               exit(unable_to_send)
 2267:     end.
 2268: 
 2269: bad_dist_ext_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2270:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2271:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2272:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2273:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2274: 
 2275:     Parent = self(),
 2276: 
 2277:     P = spawn_link(Victim,
 2278:                    fun () ->
 2279:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2280:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2281:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([one,
 2282:                                                     two,
 2283:                                                     three]),
 2284:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2285:                            receive done -> ok end
 2286:                    end),
 2287: 
 2288:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2289:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2290:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2291:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2292:     P ! one,
 2293:     send_bad_msg(Offender, P),
 2294:     P ! two,
 2295:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2296:     {message_queue_len, 2}
 2297:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2298: 
 2299:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2300:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2301:               fun () ->
 2302:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2303:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2304:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2305:               end),
 2306:     MS = erlang:monitor(process, S),
 2307:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2308:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2309:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2310:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2311:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 5),
 2312:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2313:     P ! three,
 2314:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 5),
 2315: 
 2316:     %% Make sure bad msgs has reached Victim
 2317:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2318: 
 2319:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2320:     {message_queue_len, 13}
 2321:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2322: 
 2323:     exit(S, bang),
 2324:     receive {'DOWN', MS, process, S, bang} -> ok end,
 2325:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2326:     {message_queue_len, 3}
 2327:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2328: 
 2329:     P ! check_msgs,
 2330:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2331: 
 2332:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2333:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2334: 
 2335:     P ! done,
 2336:     unlink(P),
 2337:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2338:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2339:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2340:

 2423: bad_dist_ext_connection_id(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2424:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2425:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2426:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2427:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2428: 
 2429:     Parent = self(),
 2430:     P = spawn_link(Victim,
 2431:                    fun () ->
 2432:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2433:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2434:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([]),
 2435:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2436:                            receive done -> ok end
 2437:                    end),
 2438: 
 2439:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2440:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2441:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2442:               fun () ->
 2443:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2444:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2445:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2446:               end),
 2447:     MS = erlang:monitor(process, S),
 2448:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2449:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2450:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2451:     send_bad_msg(Offender, P),
 2452: 
 2453:     %% Make sure bad msg has reached Victim
 2454:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2455: 
 2456:     {message_queue_len, 1}
 2457:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2458: 
 2459:     true = rpc:call(Offender, net_kernel, disconnect, [Victim]),
 2460:     verify_down(Offender, disconnect, Victim, connection_closed),
 2461:     pong = rpc:call(Offender, net_adm, ping, [Victim]),
 2462: 
 2463:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2464:     %% We have a new connection between Offender and Victim, bad message
 2465:     %% should not bring it down.
 2466: 
 2467:     {message_queue_len, 1}
 2468:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2469: 
 2470:     exit(S, bang),
 2471:     receive {'DOWN', MS, process, S, bang} -> ok end,
 2472:     %% Wait for a while (if the connection is taken down it might take a
 2473:     %% while).
 2474:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 2475:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2476: 
 2477:     P ! check_msgs,
 2478:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2479: 
 2480:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2481:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2482: 
 2483:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2484:     P ! done,
 2485:     unlink(P),
 2486:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2487:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2488:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2489: 
 2490: %% OTP-14661: Bad message is discovered by erts_msg_attached_data_size
 2491: bad_dist_ext_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2492:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2493:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2494:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2495:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2496: 
 2497:     Parent = self(),
 2498:     P = spawn_opt(Victim,
 2499:                    fun () ->
 2500:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2501:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,  %% DID CRASH HERE
 2502:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([one]),
 2503:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked}
 2504:                    end,
 2505:                  [link,
 2506:                   %% on_heap to force total_heap_size to inspect msg queue
 2507:                   {message_queue_data, on_heap}]),
 2508: 
 2509:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2510:     P ! one,
 2511: 
 2512:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2513:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2514:               fun () ->
 2515:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2516:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2517:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2518:               end),
 2519: 
 2520:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2521:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2522:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2523:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 1, dmsg_bad_tag()),
 2524: 
 2525:     %% Make sure bad msgs has reached Victim
 2526:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2527: 
 2528:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2529: 
 2530:     %% Let process_info(P, total_heap_size) find bad msg and disconnect
 2531:     rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, total_heap_size]),
 2532: 
 2533:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2534: 
 2535:     P ! check_msgs,
 2536:     exit(S, bang),  % resume Victim
 2537:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2538: 
 2539:     unlink(P),
 2540:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2541:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2542:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2543: 
 2544: bad_dist_ext_spawn_request_arg_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2545:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2546:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2547:     Parent = self(),
 2548:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2549:     SuccessfulSpawn = make_ref(),
 2550:     BrokenSpawn = make_ref(),
 2551:     P = spawn_link(
 2552:           Offender,
 2553:           fun () ->
 2554:                   ReqId1 = make_ref(),
 2555:                   dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Victim, ReqId1, self(), group_leader(),
 2556:                                           {erlang, send, 2}, [],
 2557:                                           dmsg_ext([self(), SuccessfulSpawn])),
 2558:                   receive SuccessfulSpawn -> Parent ! SuccessfulSpawn end,
 2559:                   receive BrokenSpawn -> ok end,
 2560:                   ReqId2 = make_ref(),
 2561:                   dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Victim, ReqId2, self(), group_leader(),
 2562:                                           {erlang, send, 2}, [],
 2563:                                           dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref()),
 2564:                   Parent ! BrokenSpawn,
 2565:                   receive after infinity -> ok end
 2566:           end),
 2567:     receive SuccessfulSpawn -> ok end,
 2568:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2569:     P ! BrokenSpawn,
 2570:     receive BrokenSpawn -> ok end,
 2571:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2572:     [] = erpc:call(
 2573:            Victim,
 2574:            fun () ->
 2575:                    lists:filter(
 2576:                      fun (Proc) ->
 2577:                              case process_info(Proc, current_function) of
 2578:                                  {current_function,
 2579:                                   {erts_internal, dist_spawn_init, 1}} ->
 2580:                                      true;
 2581:                                  _ ->
 2582:                                      false
 2583:                              end
 2584:                      end,
 2585:                      processes())
 2586:            end),
 2587:     unlink(P),
 2588:     peer:stop(OffenderPeer),
 2589:     peer:stop(VictimPeer),
 2590:     ok.
 2591: 
 2592: bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([]) ->
 2593:     receive
 2594:         Msg ->
 2595:             exit({unexpected_message, Msg})
 2596:     after 0 ->
 2597:               ok
 2598:     end;
 2599: bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([M|Ms]) ->
 2600:     receive
 2601:         {'EXIT',_,_} = EM ->
 2602:             io:format("Ignoring exit message: ~p~n",[EM]),
 2603:             bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([M|Ms]);
 2604:         Msg ->
 2605:             M = Msg,
 2606:             bad_dist_struct_check_msgs(Ms)
 2607:     end.
 2608: bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([]) ->
 2609:     receive
 2610:         Msg ->
 2611:             exit({unexpected_message, Msg})
 2612:     after 0 ->
 2613:               ok
 2614:     end;
 2615: bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([M|Ms]) ->
 2616:     receive
 2617:         Msg ->
 2618:             M = Msg,
 2619:             bad_dist_ext_check_msgs(Ms)
 2620:     end.
 2621: 
 2622: ensure_dctrl(Node) ->
 2623:     case dctrl(Node) of
 2624:         undefined ->
 2625:             pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2626:             dctrl(Node);
 2627:         DCtrl ->
 2628:             DCtrl
 2629:     end.
 2630: 
 2631: dctrl_send(DPrt, Data) when is_port(DPrt) ->
 2632:     try prim_inet:send(DPrt, Data) of
 2633:         ok ->
 2634:             ok;
 2635:         Result ->
 2636:             io:format("~w/2: ~p~n", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Result]),
 2637:             Result
 2638:     catch
 2639:         Class: Reason: Stacktrace ->
 2640:             io:format(
 2641:               "~w/2: ~p: ~p: ~p ~n",
 2642:               [?FUNCTION_NAME, Class, Reason, Stacktrace]),
 2643:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2644:     end;
 2645: dctrl_send(DPid, Data) when is_pid(DPid) ->
 2646:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2647:     DPid ! {send, self(), Ref, Data},
 2648:     receive {Ref, Res} -> Res end.
 2649: 
 2650: dctrl_dop_reg_send(Node, Name, Msg) ->
 2651:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2652:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2653:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_REG_SEND,
 2654:                           self(),
 2655:                           ?COOKIE,
 2656:                           Name}),
 2657:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 2658: 
 2659: dctrl_dop_send(To, Msg) ->
 2660:     Node = node(To),
 2661:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2662:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2663:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SEND, ?COOKIE, To}),
 2664:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 2665: 
 2666: dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Node, ReqId, From, GL, MFA, OptList, ArgListExt) ->
 2667:     %% {29, ReqId, From, GroupLeader, {Module, Function, Arity}, OptList}
 2668:     %%
 2669:     %% Followed by ArgList.
 2670:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2671:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2672:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SPAWN_REQUEST, ReqId, From, GL, MFA, OptList}),
 2673:                 ArgListExt]).
 2674: 
 2675: send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf) ->
 2676:     send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf,[]).
 2677: send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf,PayLoad) ->
 2678:     Parent = self(),
 2679:     Done = make_ref(),
 2680:     spawn_link(Offender,
 2681:           fun () ->
 2682:                   Node = node(Victim),
 2683:                   pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2684:                   erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 2685:                   DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2686:                   Bad1 = case WhereToPutSelf of
 2687:                              0 ->
 2688:                                  Bad;
 2689:                              N when N > 0 ->
 2690:                                  setelement(N,Bad,self())
 2691:                          end,
 2692:                   DData = [dmsg_hdr(),
 2693:                            dmsg_ext(Bad1)] ++
 2694:                   case PayLoad of
 2695:                       [] -> [];
 2696:                       _Other -> [dmsg_ext(PayLoad)]
 2697:                   end,
 2698: 
 2699:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> exit("premature nodedown")
 2700:                   after 10 -> ok
 2701:                   end,
 2702: 
 2703:                   dctrl_send(DCtrl, DData),
 2704: 
 2705:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok
 2706:                   after 5000 -> exit("missing nodedown")
 2707:                   end,
 2708:                   Parent ! {DData,Done}
 2709:           end),
 2710:     receive
 2711:         {WhatSent,Done} ->
 2712:             io:format("Offender sent ~p~n",[WhatSent]),
 2713:             ok
 2714:     after 5000 ->
 2715:               exit(unable_to_send)
 2716:     end.
 2717: 
 2718: 
 2719: %% send_bad_msgs():
 2720: %% Send a valid distribution header and control message
 2721: %% but an invalid message. This invalid message will be
 2722: %% enqueued in the receivers message queue.
 2723: send_bad_msg(BadNode, To) ->
 2724:     send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, 1).
 2725: 
 2726: send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat) ->
 2727:     send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat, dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref()).
 2728: 
 2729: send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat, BadTerm) when is_atom(BadNode),
 2730:                                                  is_pid(To),
 2731:                                                  is_integer(Repeat) ->
 2732:     Parent = self(),
 2733:     Done = make_ref(),
 2734:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2735:                fun () ->
 2736:                        Node = node(To),
 2737:                        pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2738:                        DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2739:                        DData = [dmsg_hdr(),
 2740:                                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SEND, ?COOKIE, To}),
 2741:                                 BadTerm],
 2742: 		       repeat(fun () -> dctrl_send(DCtrl, DData) end, Repeat),
 2743:                        Parent ! Done
 2744:                end),
 2745:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2746: 
 2747: %% send_bad_ctl():
 2748: %% Send a valid distribution header but an invalid control message.
 2749: send_bad_ctl(BadNode, ToNode) when is_atom(BadNode), is_atom(ToNode) ->
 2750:     Parent = self(),
 2751:     Done = make_ref(),
 2752:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2753:                fun () ->
 2754:                        pong = net_adm:ping(ToNode),
 2755:                        %% We create a valid ctl msg and replace an
 2756:                        %% atom with an invalid atom cache reference
 2757:                        <<131,Replace/binary>> = term_to_binary(replace),
 2758:                        Ctl = dmsg_ext({?DOP_REG_SEND,
 2759:                                        self(),
 2760:                                        ?COOKIE,
 2761:                                        replace}),
 2762:                        CtlBeginSize = size(Ctl) - size(Replace),
 2763:                        <<CtlBegin:CtlBeginSize/binary, Replace/binary>> = Ctl,
 2764:                        DCtrl = dctrl(ToNode),
 2765:                        Data = [dmsg_fake_hdr2(),
 2766:                                CtlBegin,
 2767:                                dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref(),
 2768:                                dmsg_ext({a, message})],
 2769:                        dctrl_send(DCtrl, Data),
 2770:                        Parent ! Done
 2771:                end),
 2772:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2773: 
 2774: %% send_bad_dhr():
 2775: %% Send an invalid distribution header
 2776: send_bad_dhdr(BadNode, ToNode) when is_atom(BadNode), is_atom(ToNode) ->
 2777:     Parent = self(),
 2778:     Done = make_ref(),
 2779:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2780:                fun () ->
 2781:                        pong = net_adm:ping(ToNode),
 2782:                        dctrl_send(dctrl(ToNode), dmsg_bad_hdr()),
 2783:                        Parent ! Done
 2784:                end),
 2785:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2786: 
 2787: dctrl(Node) when is_atom(Node) ->
 2788:     get_internal_state({dist_ctrl, Node}).
 2789: 
 2790: get_internal_state(Op) ->
 2791:     try erts_debug:get_internal_state(Op) of
 2792:         R -> R
 2793:     catch
 2794:         error:undef ->
 2795:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2796:             erts_debug:get_internal_state(Op)
 2797:     end.
 2798: 
 2799: set_internal_state(Op, Val) ->
 2800:     try erts_debug:set_internal_state(Op, Val) of
 2801:         R -> R
 2802:     catch
 2803:         error:undef ->
 2804:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2805:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(Op, Val)
 2806:     end.
 2807: 
 2808: 
 2809: dmsg_hdr() ->
 2810:     [131, % Version Magic
 2811:      $D,  % Dist header
 2812:      0].  % No atom cache references
 2813: 
 2814: dmsg_bad_hdr() ->
 2815:     [131, % Version Magic
 2816:      $D,  % Dist header
 2817:      255].  % 255 atom references
 2818: 
 2819: 
 2820: %% dmsg_fake_hdr1() ->
 2821: %%     A = <<"fake header atom 1">>,
 2822: %%     [131, % Version Magic
 2823: %%      $D, 1, 16#8, 0, size(A), A]. % Fake header
 2824: 
 2825: dmsg_fake_hdr2() ->
 2826:     A1 = <<"fake header atom 1">>,
 2827:     A2 = <<"atom 2">>,
 2828:     A3 = <<"atom 3">>,
 2829:     [131, % Version Magic
 2830:      $D,
 2831:      3,
 2832:      16#88, 16#08, % Flags
 2833:      0, size(A1), A1,
 2834:      1, size(A2), A2,
 2835:      2, size(A3), A3].
 2836: 
 2837: dmsg_ext(Term) ->
 2838:     <<131, Res/binary>> = term_to_binary(Term),
 2839:     Res.
 2840: 
 2841: dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref() ->
 2842:     [$R, 137].
 2843: 
 2844: dmsg_bad_tag() ->  %% Will fail early at heap size calculation
 2845:     [$?, 66].
 2846: 
 2847: %% Test that processes exiting while sending a fragmented message works
 2848: %% as it should. We test that this works while the process doing the send
 2849: %% is suspended/resumed in order to trigger bugs in suspend/resume handling
 2850: %% while exiting.
 2851: %% We also make sure that the binary memory of the receiving node does not grow
 2852: %% without shrinking back as there used to be a memory leak on the receiving side.
 2853: exit_dist_fragments(_Config) ->
 2854:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 2855:     try
 2856:         ct:log("Allocations before:~n~p",[erpc:call(Node,instrument,allocations, [])]),
 2857:         {BinInfo, BinInfoMref} =
 2858:             spawn_monitor(Node,
 2859:                           fun() ->
 2860:                                   (fun F(Acc) ->
 2861:                                            H = try erlang:memory(binary)
 2862:                                                catch _:_ -> 0 end,
 2863:                                            receive
 2864:                                                {get, Pid} ->
 2865:                                                    After = try erlang:memory(binary)
 2866:                                                            catch _:_ -> 0 end,
 2867:                                                    Pid ! lists:reverse([After,H|Acc])
 2868:                                            after 100 ->
 2869:                                                    F([H|Acc])
 2870:                                            end
 2871:                                    end)([])
 2872:                           end),
 2873:         {Tracer, Mref} = spawn_monitor(fun gather_exited/0),
 2874:         link(Tracer), %% Make sure Tracer dies if we die
 2875:         erlang:trace(self(), true, [{tracer, Tracer}, set_on_spawn, procs, exiting]),
 2876:         exit_suspend(Node),
 2877:         receive
 2878:             {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 2879:                 BinInfo ! {get, self()},
 2880:                 receive
 2881:                     {'DOWN',BinInfoMref,_,_,Reason} ->
 2882:                         ct:fail(Reason);
 2883:                     Info ->
 2884:                         Before = hd(Info),
 2885:                         Max = lists:max(Info),
 2886:                         After = lists:last(Info),
 2887:                         ct:log("Binary memory before: ~p~n"
 2888:                                "Binary memory max: ~p~n"
 2889:                                "Binary memory after: ~p",
 2890:                                [Before, Max, After]),
 2891:                         ct:log("Allocations after:~n~p",
 2892:                                [erpc:call(Node,instrument,allocations, [])]),
 2893:                         %% We check that the binary data used after is not too large
 2894:                         if
 2895:                             (After - Before) / (Max - Before) > 0.05 ->
 2896:                                 ct:log("Memory ratio was ~p",[(After - Before) / (Max - Before)]),
 2897:                                 ct:fail("Potential binary memory leak!");
 2898:                             true -> ok
 2899:                         end
 2900:                 end
 2901:         end
 2902:     after
 2903:         peer:stop(Peer)
 2904:     end.
 2905: 
 2906: %% Make sure that each spawned process also has exited
 2907: gather_exited() ->
 2908:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 2909:     gather_exited(#{}).
 2910: gather_exited(Pids) ->
 2911:     receive
 2912:         {trace,Pid,spawned,_,_} ->
 2913:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(spawned, fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, Pids#{ Pid => true }));
 2914:         {trace,Pid,out_exited,_} ->
 2915:             {true, NewPids} = maps:take(Pid, Pids),
 2916:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(out_exited, fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, NewPids));
 2917:         Trace ->
 2918:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(element(3, Trace), fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, Pids))
 2919:     after 1000 ->
 2920:             MissingPids = maps:size(maps:filter(fun(Key,_) -> not erlang:is_atom(Key) end, Pids)),
 2921:             if MissingPids =:= 0 -> ok;
 2922:                true -> exit({[{Pid,erlang:process_info(Pid)} || Pid <- MissingPids],
 2923:                              maps:filter(fun(Key,_) -> erlang:is_atom(Key) end, Pids)})
 2924:             end
 2925:     end.
 2926: 
 2927: exit_suspend(RemoteNode) ->
 2928:     exit_suspend(RemoteNode, 100).
 2929: exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N) ->
 2930:     Payload = case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 2931:                   8 ->
 2932:                       [<<0:100000/unit:8>> || _ <- lists:seq(1, 10)];
 2933:                   4 ->
 2934:                       [<<0:100000/unit:8>> || _ <- lists:seq(1, 2)]
 2935:               end,
 2936:     exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N, Payload).
 2937: exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N, Payload) ->
 2938:     Echo = fun F() ->
 2939:                    receive
 2940:                        {From, Msg} ->
 2941:                            From ! erlang:iolist_size(Msg),
 2942:                            F()
 2943:                    end
 2944:            end,
 2945:     Pinger =
 2946:         fun() ->
 2947:                 false = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2948:                 RemotePid = spawn_link(RemoteNode, Echo),
 2949:                 Iterations = case erlang:system_info(emu_type) of
 2950:                                  opt ->
 2951:                                      100;
 2952:                                  _ ->
 2953:                                      10
 2954:                              end,
 2955:                 exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, 2, Payload, Iterations)
 2956:         end,
 2957:     Pids = [spawn_link(Pinger) || _ <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 2958:     MRefs = [monitor(process, Pid) || Pid <- Pids],
 2959:     [receive {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,_} -> ok end || MRef <- MRefs],
 2960:     Pids.
 2961: 
 2962: exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, _Suspenders, _Payload, 0) ->
 2963:     exit(RemotePid, die),
 2964:     receive
 2965:         {'EXIT', RemotePid, _} ->
 2966:             ok
 2967:     end;
 2968: exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N) ->
 2969:     LocalPid = spawn_link(
 2970:                  fun() ->
 2971:                          Parent = self(),
 2972:                          [spawn_link(
 2973:                             fun F() ->
 2974:                                     try
 2975:                                         begin
 2976:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2977:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2978:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2979:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2980:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2981:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2982:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2983:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2984:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2985:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2986:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2987:                                             erlang:yield()
 2988:                                         end of
 2989:                                         _ ->
 2990:                                             F()
 2991:                                     catch _:_ ->
 2992:                                             ok
 2993:                                     end
 2994:                             end) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Suspenders)],
 2995:                          (fun F() ->
 2996:                                   RemotePid ! {self(), Payload},
 2997:                                   receive _IOListSize -> ok end,
 2998:                                   F()
 2999:                           end)()
 3000:                  end),
 3001:     exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N - 1).
 3002: exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N) ->
 3003:     receive
 3004:         {'EXIT', LocalPid, _} ->
 3005:             exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N);
 3006:         {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3007:             exit(Reason)
 3008:     after 100 ->
 3009:             exit(LocalPid, die),
 3010:             exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N)
 3011:     end.
 3012: 
 3013: start_epmd_false(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3014:     %% Start a node with the option -start_epmd false.
 3015:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-start_epmd", "false"]),
 3016:     %% We should be able to ping it, as epmd was started by us:
 3017:     pong = net_adm:ping(OtherNode),
 3018:     peer_stop(Peer,OtherNode),
 3019: 
 3020:     ok.
 3021: 
 3022: no_epmd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3023:     %% Trying to start a node with -no_epmd but without passing the
 3024:     %% --proto_dist option should fail.
 3025:     try
 3026:         ?CT_PEER(#{connection => standard_io, args => ["-no_epmd"]}),
 3027:         ct:fail(unexpected_no_epmd_start)
 3028:     catch
 3029:         exit:{boot_failed, {exit_status, 1}} ->
 3030:             ok
 3031:     end.
 3032: 
 3033: epmd_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3034:     %% We need a relay node to test this, since the test node uses the
 3035:     %% standard epmd module.
 3036:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(
 3037:                             #{connection => 0,
 3038:                               name => "epmd_module_node1",
 3039:                               host => "dummy",
 3040:                               args => ["-setcookie", "NONE", "-epmd_module", ?MODULE_STRING]}),
 3041:     %% Ask what port it's listening on - it won't have registered with epmd.
 3042:     {ok, Port1} = peer:call(Peer1, application, get_env, [kernel, dist_listen_port]),
 3043: 
 3044:     %% Start a second node, passing the port number as a secret argument.
 3045:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(
 3046:                             #{connection => 0,
 3047:                               name => "epmd_module_node2",
 3048:                               host => "dummy",
 3049:                               args => ["-setcookie", "NONE", "-epmd_module", ?MODULE_STRING,
 3050:                                        "-other_node_port", integer_to_list(Port1)]}),
 3051: 
 3052:     %% Node 1 can't ping node 2
 3053:     pang = peer:call(Peer1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 3054:     [] = peer:call(Peer1, erlang, nodes, []),
 3055:     [] = peer:call(Peer2, erlang, nodes, []),
 3056:     %% But node 2 can ping node 1
 3057:     pong = peer:call(Peer2, net_adm, ping, [Node1]),
 3058:     [Node2] = peer:call(Peer1, erlang, nodes, []),
 3059:     [Node1] = peer:call(Peer2, erlang, nodes, []),
 3060: 
 3061:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 3062:     peer:stop(Peer1).
 3063: 
 3064: %% epmd_module functions:
 3065: 
 3066: start_link() ->
 3067:     ignore.
 3068: 
 3069: register_node(Name, Port) ->
 3070:     register_node(Name, Port, inet_tcp).
 3071: register_node(_Name, Port, _Driver) ->
 3072:     %% Save the port number we're listening on.
 3073:     application:set_env(kernel, dist_listen_port, Port),
 3074:     Creation = rand:uniform(3),
 3075:     {ok, Creation}.
 3076: 
 3077: port_please(_Name, _Ip) ->
 3078:     case init:get_argument(other_node_port) of
 3079: 	error ->
 3080: 	    %% None specified.  Default to 42.
 3081: 	    Port = 42,
 3082: 	    Version = 5,
 3083: 	    {port, Port, Version};
 3084: 	{ok, [[PortS]]} ->
 3085: 	    %% Port number given on command line.
 3086: 	    Port = list_to_integer(PortS),
 3087: 	    Version = 5,
 3088: 	    {port, Port, Version}
 3089:     end.
 3090: 
 3091: address_please(_Name, "dummy", inet) ->
 3092:     %% Use localhost.
 3093:     {ok, {127,0,0,1}};
 3094: address_please(_Name, "dummy", inet6) ->
 3095:     {ok, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}.
 3096: 
 3097: hopefull_data_encoding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3098:     MkHopefullData = fun(Ref,Pid) -> mk_hopefull_data(Ref,Pid) end,
 3099:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkHopefullData),
 3100: 
 3101:     %% Test funs with hopefully encoded term in environment
 3102:     MkBitstringInFunEnv = fun(_,_) -> [mk_fun_with_env(<<5:7>>)] end,
 3103:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkBitstringInFunEnv),
 3104:     MkExpFunInFunEnv = fun(_,_) -> [mk_fun_with_env(fun a:a/0)] end,
 3105:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkExpFunInFunEnv),
 3106:     ok.
 3107: 
 3108: mk_fun_with_env(Term) ->
 3109:     fun() -> Term end.
 3110: 
 3111: test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkDataFun) ->
 3112:     {ok, PeerProxy, ProxyNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3113:     {ok, PeerBouncer, BouncerNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-hidden"]),
 3114:     Tester = self(),
 3115:     R1 = make_ref(),
 3116:     R2 = make_ref(),
 3117:     R3 = make_ref(),
 3118:     Bouncer = spawn_link(BouncerNode, fun () -> bounce_loop() end),
 3119:     Proxy = spawn_link(ProxyNode,
 3120:                        fun () ->
 3121:                                register(bouncer, self()),
 3122:                                %% We create the data on the proxy node in order
 3123:                                %% to create the correct sub binaries
 3124:                                HData = MkDataFun(R1, Tester),
 3125:                                %% Verify same result between this node and tester
 3126:                                Tester ! [R1, HData],
 3127:                                %% Test when connection has not been setup yet
 3128:                                Bouncer ! {Tester, [R2, HData]},
 3129:                                Sync = make_ref(),
 3130:                                Bouncer ! {self(), Sync},
 3131:                                receive Sync -> ok end,
 3132:                                %% Test when connection is already up
 3133:                                Bouncer ! {Tester, [R3, HData]},
 3134:                                receive after infinity -> ok end
 3135:                        end),
 3136:     HData =
 3137:         receive
 3138:             [R1, HData1] ->
 3139:                 HData1
 3140:         end,
 3141:     receive
 3142:         [R2, HData2] ->
 3143:             HData = HData2
 3144:     end,
 3145:     receive
 3146:         [R3, HData3] ->
 3147:             HData = HData3
 3148:     end,
 3149:     unlink(Proxy),
 3150:     exit(Proxy, bye),
 3151:     unlink(Bouncer),
 3152:     exit(Bouncer, bye),
 3153:     peer_stop(PeerProxy, ProxyNode),
 3154:     peer_stop(PeerBouncer, BouncerNode),
 3155:     ok.
 3156: 
 3157: bounce_loop() ->
 3158:     receive
 3159:         {SendTo, Data} ->
 3160:             SendTo ! Data
 3161:     end,
 3162:     bounce_loop().
 3163: 
 3164: mk_hopefull_data(RemoteRef, RemotePid) ->
 3165:     HugeBs = list_to_bitstring([lists:duplicate(12*1024*1024, 85), <<6:6>>]),
 3166:     <<_:1/bitstring,HugeBs2/bitstring>> = HugeBs,
 3167:     mk_hopefull_data(list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,255))) ++
 3168:         [1234567890, HugeBs, fun gurka:banan/3, fun erlang:node/1,
 3169:          RemotePid, self(), fun erlang:self/0] ++
 3170:         mk_hopefull_data(list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,32))) ++
 3171:         [an_atom,
 3172:          fun lists:reverse/1, RemoteRef, make_ref(), HugeBs2,
 3173:          fun blipp:blapp/7].
 3174: 
 3175: mk_hopefull_data(BS) ->
 3176:     BSsz = bit_size(BS),
 3177:     lists:concat(
 3178:       [lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3179:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3180:                          NewBs
 3181:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3182:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3183:                          <<_:Offset/bitstring, NewBs/bitstring>> = BS,
 3184:                          NewBs
 3185:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3186:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3187:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3188:                          NewBs
 3189:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-16, BSsz-1)),
 3190:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3191:                          PreOffset = Offset rem 16,
 3192:                          <<_:PreOffset/bitstring, NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3193:                          NewBs
 3194:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-32, BSsz-17)),
 3195:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3196:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3197:                          [NewBs]
 3198:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3199:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3200:                          <<_:Offset/bitstring, NewBs/bitstring>> = BS,
 3201:                          [NewBs]
 3202:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3203:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3204:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3205:                          [NewBs]
 3206:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-16, BSsz-1)),
 3207:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3208:                          PreOffset = Offset rem 16,
 3209:                          <<_:PreOffset/bitstring, NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3210:                          [NewBs]
 3211:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-32, BSsz-17))]).
 3212: 
 3213: %% ERL-1254
 3214: hopefull_export_fun_bug(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3215:     Msg = [1, fun blipp:blapp/7,
 3216:            2, fun blipp:blapp/7],
 3217:     {dummy, dummy@dummy} ! Msg.  % Would crash on debug VM
 3218: 
 3219: huge_iovec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3220:     %% Make sure that we can pass a term that will produce
 3221:     %% an io-vector larger than IOV_MAX over the distribution...
 3222:     %% IOV_MAX is typically 1024. Currently we produce an
 3223:     %% element in the io-vector for all off heap binaries...
 3224:     NoBinaries = 1 bsl 14,
 3225:     BinarySize = 65,
 3226:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3227:     P = spawn_link(Node,
 3228:                    fun () ->
 3229:                            receive {From, Data} ->
 3230:                                    From ! {self(), Data}
 3231:                            end
 3232:                    end),
 3233:     RBL = mk_rand_bin_list(BinarySize, NoBinaries),
 3234:     %% Check that it actually will produce a huge iovec...
 3235:     %% If we set a limit on the size of the binaries
 3236:     %% that will produce an element in the io-vector
 3237:     %% we need to adjust this testcase...
 3238:     true = length(term_to_iovec(RBL)) >= NoBinaries,
 3239:     P ! {self(), RBL},
 3240:     receive
 3241:         {P, EchoedRBL} ->
 3242:             peer_stop(Peer, Node),
 3243:             RBL = EchoedRBL
 3244:     end,
 3245:     ok.
 3246: 
 3247: mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries) ->
 3248:     mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries, []).
 3249: 
 3250: mk_rand_bin_list(_Bytes, 0, Acc) ->
 3251:     Acc;
 3252: mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries, Acc) ->
 3253:     mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries-1, [rand:bytes(Bytes) | Acc]).
 3254: 
 3255: %% Try provoke DistEntry refc bugs (OTP-17513).
 3256: dist_entry_refc_race(_Config) ->
 3257:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+zdntgc", "1"]),
 3258:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE, derr_run, [self()]),
 3259:     {Pid, done} = receive M -> M end,
 3260:     peer_stop(Peer, Node),
 3261:     ok.
 3262: 
 3263: derr_run(Papa) ->
 3264:     inet_db:set_lookup([file]), % make connection attempt fail fast
 3265:     NScheds = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 3266:     SeqList = lists:seq(1, 25 * NScheds),
 3267:     Nodes = [list_to_atom("none@host" ++ integer_to_list(Seq))
 3268:              || Seq <- SeqList],
 3269:     Self = self(),
 3270:     Pids = [spawn_link(fun () -> derr_sender(Self, Nodes) end)
 3271:             || _ <- SeqList],
 3272:     derr_count(1, 8000),
 3273:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P,kill) end || P <- Pids],
 3274:     Papa ! {self(), done},
 3275:     ok.
 3276: 
 3277: derr_count(Max, Max) ->
 3278:     done;
 3279: derr_count(N, Max) ->
 3280:     receive
 3281:         count -> ok
 3282:     end,
 3283:     case N rem 1000 of
 3284:         0 ->
 3285:             io:format("Total attempts: ~bk~n", [N div 1000]);
 3286:         _ -> ok
 3287:     end,
 3288:     derr_count(N+1, Max).
 3289: 
 3290: 
 3291: derr_sender(Main, Nodes) ->
 3292:     [{none, Node} ! msg || Node <- Nodes],
 3293:     Main ! count,
 3294:     derr_sender(Main, Nodes).
 3295: 
 3296: is_alive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3297:     %% Test that distribution is up when erlang:is_alive() return true...
 3298:     Args = ["-setcookie", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 3299:             "-pa", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE))],
 3300:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(#{connection => 0, args => Args}),
 3301:     NodeName = peer:random_name(),
 3302:     LongNames = net_kernel:longnames(),
 3303:     StartOpts = #{name_domain => if LongNames -> longnames;
 3304:                                     true -> shortnames
 3305:                                  end},
 3306:     ThisNode = node(),
 3307:     TestFun = fun () -> is_alive_test(list_to_atom(NodeName), StartOpts, ThisNode) end,
 3308:     ok = peer:call(Peer, erlang, apply, [TestFun, []]),
 3309:     Node = list_to_atom(NodeName++"@"++hostname()),
 3310:     true = lists:member(Node, nodes()),
 3311:     peer:stop(Peer),
 3312:     ok.
 3313: 
 3314: is_alive_test(NodeName, StartOpts, TestNode) ->
 3315:     try
 3316:         monitor_node(TestNode, true),
 3317:         error(unexpected_success)
 3318:     catch
 3319:         error:notalive ->
 3320:             ok
 3321:     end,
 3322:     Me = self(),
 3323:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3324:                                        Me ! {self(), go},
 3325:                                        is_alive_tester(TestNode),
 3326:                                        Me ! {self(), ok}
 3327:                                end),
 3328:     receive {Pid, go} -> ok end,
 3329:     receive after 500 -> ok end,
 3330:     _ = net_kernel:start(NodeName, StartOpts),
 3331:     receive
 3332:         {Pid, ok} -> erlang:demonitor(Mon, [flush]), ok;
 3333:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} -> error(Reason)
 3334:     end.
 3335: 
 3336: is_alive_tester(Node) ->
 3337:     case erlang:is_alive() of
 3338:         false ->
 3339:             is_alive_tester(Node);
 3340:         true ->
 3341:             monitor_node(Node, true),
 3342:             wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(Node, nodes()) end),
 3343:             ok
 3344:     end.
 3345: 
 3346: dyn_node_name_monitor_node(_Config) ->
 3347:     %% Test that monitor_node() does not fail when erlang:is_alive() return true
 3348:     %% but we have not yet gotten a name...
 3349:     Args = ["-setcookie", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 3350:             "-pa", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE))],
 3351:     {ok, Peer, nonode@nohost} = peer:start_link(#{connection => 0, args => Args}),
 3352:     [] = nodes(),
 3353:     LongNames = net_kernel:longnames(),
 3354:     StartOpts = #{name_domain => if LongNames -> longnames;
 3355:                                     true -> shortnames
 3356:                                  end},
 3357:     ThisNode = node(),
 3358:     TestFun = fun () -> dyn_node_name_monitor_node_test(StartOpts, ThisNode) end,
 3359:     ok = peer:call(Peer, erlang, apply, [TestFun, []]),
 3360:     peer:stop(Peer),
 3361:     ok.
 3362:     
 3363: dyn_node_name_monitor_node_test(StartOpts, TestNode) ->
 3364:     try
 3365:         monitor_node(TestNode, true),
 3366:         error(unexpected_success)
 3367:     catch
 3368:         error:notalive ->
 3369:             ok
 3370:     end,
 3371:     _ = net_kernel:start(undefined, StartOpts),
 3372:     true = erlang:is_alive(),
 3373:     true = monitor_node(TestNode, true),
 3374:     receive {nodedown, TestNode} -> ok end,
 3375:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
 3376:     true = monitor_node(TestNode, true),
 3377:     true = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 3378:     receive {nodedown, TestNode} -> error(unexpected_nodedown)
 3379:     after 1000 -> ok
 3380:     end,
 3381:     ok.

 3400: dyn_node_name_monitor_test(StartOpts, TestNode) ->
 3401:     try
 3402:         monitor(process, {net_kernel, TestNode}),
 3403:         error(unexpected_success)
 3404:     catch
 3405:         error:badarg ->
 3406:             ok
 3407:     end,

 3409:     true = erlang:is_alive(),
 3410:     Mon = monitor(process, {net_kernel, TestNode}),
 3411:     receive
 3412:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, {net_kernel, TestNode}, noconnection} ->
 3413:             ok
 3414:     end,
 3415:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
 3416:     Mon2 = monitor(process, {net_kernel, TestNode}),
 3417:     true = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 3418:     receive
 3419:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, {net_kernel, TestNode}, noconnection} ->
 3420:             error(unexpected_down)

 3422:         1000 ->
 3423:             ok
 3424:     end,
 3425:     ok.

 3427: async_dist_flag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3428:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3429:     async_dist_flag_test(Node1, false),
 3430:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 3431:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "false"]),
 3432:     async_dist_flag_test(Node2, false),
 3433:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 3434:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "true", "+pad", "false"]),
 3435:     async_dist_flag_test(Node3, false),
 3436:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 3437: 
 3438:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "true"]),
 3439:     async_dist_flag_test(Node4, true),
 3440:     peer:stop(Peer4),
 3441:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "false", "+pad", "true"]),
 3442:     async_dist_flag_test(Node5, true),
 3443:     peer:stop(Peer5),
 3444: 
 3445:     ok.

 3447: async_dist_flag_test(Node, Default) when is_atom(Node), is_boolean(Default) ->
 3448:     Tester = self(),
 3449:     NotDefault = not Default,
 3450: 
 3451:     Default = erpc:call(Node, erlang, system_info, [async_dist]),
 3452: 
 3453:     {P1, M1} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3454:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3455:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3456:     {P2, M2} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3457:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3458:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, false}]),
 3459:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3460:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3461:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, true}]),
 3462:     {async_dist, Default} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P1, async_dist]),
 3463:     {async_dist, false} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P2, async_dist]),
 3464:     {async_dist, true} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P3, async_dist]),
 3465: 
 3466:     R4 = make_ref(),
 3467:     {P4, M4} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3468:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3469:                                        Tester ! R4,
 3470:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3471:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3472: 
 3473:     R5 = make_ref(),
 3474:     {P5, M5} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3475:                                        false = process_flag(async_dist, true),
 3476:                                        Tester ! R5,
 3477:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3478:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, false}]),
 3479:     R6 = make_ref(),
 3480:     {P6, M6} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3481:                                        true = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3482:                                        Tester ! R6,
 3483:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3484:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, true}]),
 3485:     receive R4 -> ok end,
 3486:     {async_dist, NotDefault} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P4, async_dist]),
 3487:     receive R5 -> ok end,
 3488:     {async_dist, true} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P5, async_dist]),
 3489:     receive R6 -> ok end,
 3490:     {async_dist, false} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P6, async_dist]),
 3491: 
 3492: 
 3493:     R7 = make_ref(),
 3494:     {P7, M7} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3495:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3496:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3497:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3498:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3499:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3500:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3501:                                        Tester ! R7,
 3502:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3503:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3504:     receive R7 -> ok end,
 3505: 
 3506:     unlink(P1),
 3507:     exit(P1, bang),
 3508:     unlink(P2),
 3509:     exit(P2, bang),
 3510:     unlink(P3),
 3511:     exit(P3, bang),
 3512:     unlink(P4),
 3513:     exit(P4, bang),
 3514:     unlink(P5),
 3515:     exit(P5, bang),
 3516:     unlink(P6),
 3517:     exit(P6, bang),
 3518:     unlink(P7),
 3519:     exit(P7, bang),
 3520: 
 3521:     receive {'DOWN', M1, process, P1, bang} -> ok end,
 3522:     receive {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, bang} -> ok end,
 3523:     receive {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, bang} -> ok end,
 3524:     receive {'DOWN', M4, process, P4, bang} -> ok end,
 3525:     receive {'DOWN', M5, process, P5, bang} -> ok end,
 3526:     receive {'DOWN', M6, process, P6, bang} -> ok end,
 3527:     receive {'DOWN', M7, process, P7, bang} -> ok end,
 3528: 
 3529:     ok.

 3531: async_dist_port_dctrlr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3532:     {ok, RecvPeer, RecvNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3533:     ok = async_dist_test(RecvNode),
 3534:     peer:stop(RecvPeer),
 3535:     ok.
