 3537: async_dist_proc_dctrlr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3538:     {ok, SendPeer, SendNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-proto_dist", "gen_tcp"]),
 3539:     {ok, RecvPeer, RecvNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-proto_dist", "gen_tcp"]),
 3540:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(SendNode,
 3541:                                fun () ->
 3542:                                        ok = async_dist_test(RecvNode),
 3543:                                        exit(test_success)
 3544:                                end),
 3545:     receive
 3546:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3547:             test_success = Reason
 3548:     end,
 3549:     peer:stop(SendPeer),
 3550:     peer:stop(RecvPeer),
 3551:     ok.
 3552: 
 3553: async_dist_test(Node) ->
 3554:     Scale = case round(test_server:timetrap_scale_factor()/3) of
 3555:                 S when S < 1 -> 1;
 3556:                 S -> S
 3557:             end,
 3558:     _ = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3559:     Tester = self(),
 3560:     AliveReceiver1 = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 3561:                                               register(alive_receiver_1, self()),
 3562:                                               Tester ! {registered, self()},
 3563:                                               receive after infinity -> ok end
 3564:                                       end),
 3565:     receive {registered, AliveReceiver1} -> ok end,
 3566:     AliveReceiver2 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 3567:     {AliveReceiver3, AR3Mon} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 3568:                                              fun () ->
 3569:                                                      receive after infinity -> ok end
 3570:                                              end),
 3571:     {DeadReceiver, DRMon} = spawn_monitor(Node, fun () -> ok end),
 3572:     receive
 3573:         {'DOWN', DRMon, process, DeadReceiver, DRReason} ->
 3574:             normal = DRReason
 3575:     end,
 3576:     Data = lists:duplicate($x, 256),
 3577:     GoNuts = fun GN () ->
 3578:                      DeadReceiver ! hello,
 3579:                      GN()
 3580:              end,
 3581:     erpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state, true]),
 3582:     erpc:cast(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [block, 4000*Scale]),
 3583:     DistBufFiller = spawn_link(fun () ->
 3584:                                        process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3585:                                        receive go_nuts -> ok end,
 3586:                                        GoNuts()
 3587:                                end),
 3588:     BDMon = spawn_link(fun SysMon () ->
 3589:                                receive
 3590:                                    {monitor, Pid, busy_dist_port, _} ->
 3591:                                        Tester ! {busy_dist_port, Pid}
 3592:                                end,
 3593:                                SysMon()
 3594:                        end),
 3595:     _ = erlang:system_monitor(BDMon, [busy_dist_port]),
 3596:     DistBufFiller ! go_nuts,
 3597: 
 3598:     %% Busy dist entry may release after it has triggered even
 3599:     %% though noone is consuming anything at the receiving end.
 3600:     %% Continue banging until we stop getting new busy_dist_port...
 3601:     WaitFilled = fun WF (Tmo) ->
 3602:                          receive
 3603:                              {busy_dist_port, DistBufFiller} ->
 3604:                                  WF(1000*Scale)
 3605:                          after
 3606:                              Tmo ->
 3607:                                  ok
 3608:                          end
 3609:                  end,
 3610:     WaitFilled(infinity),
 3611: 
 3612:     BusyDistChecker = spawn_link(fun () ->
 3613:                                          process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3614:                                          DeadReceiver ! hello,
 3615:                                          exit(unexpected_return_from_bang)
 3616:                                  end),
 3617:     receive {busy_dist_port, BusyDistChecker} -> ok end,
 3618:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3619:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(BusyDistChecker, async_dist),
 3620:     false = process_flag(async_dist, true),
 3621:     {async_dist, true} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3622: 
 3623:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 3624:     M1 = erlang:monitor(process, AliveReceiver1),
 3625:     true = is_reference(M1),
 3626:     M2 = erlang:monitor(process, AliveReceiver2),
 3627:     true = is_reference(M2),
 3628:     {pid, Data} = AliveReceiver1 ! {pid, Data},
 3629:     {reg_name, Data} = {alive_receiver_1, Node} ! {reg_name, Data},
 3630:     true = erlang:demonitor(M1),
 3631:     true = link(AliveReceiver2),
 3632:     true = unlink(AliveReceiver1),
 3633:     RId = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> receive bye -> ok end end, [link, monitor]),
 3634:     true = is_reference(RId),
 3635:     erlang:group_leader(self(), AliveReceiver2),
 3636:     AR3XReason = make_ref(),
 3637:     true = exit(AliveReceiver3, AR3XReason),
 3638:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 3639: 
 3640:     %% These signals should have been buffered immediately. Make sure
 3641:     %% it did not take a long time...
 3642:     true = 500*Scale >= End - Start,
 3643: 
 3644:     receive after 500*Scale -> ok end,
 3645: 
 3646:     unlink(BusyDistChecker),
 3647:     exit(BusyDistChecker, bang),
 3648:     false = is_process_alive(BusyDistChecker),
 3649: 
 3650:     unlink(DistBufFiller),
 3651:     exit(DistBufFiller, bang),
 3652:     false = is_process_alive(DistBufFiller),
 3653: 
 3654:     %% Verify that the signals eventually get trough when the other
 3655:     %% node continue to work...
 3656:     {links, []}
 3657:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, links]),
 3658:     {links, [Tester]}
 3659:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, links]),
 3660:     {monitored_by, []}
 3661:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, monitored_by]),
 3662:     {monitored_by, [Tester]}
 3663:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, monitored_by]),
 3664:     {messages, [{pid, Data}, {reg_name, Data}]}
 3665:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, messages]),
 3666:     {group_leader, Tester}
 3667:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, group_leader]),
 3668: 
 3669:     Spawned = receive
 3670:                   {spawn_reply, RId, SpawnRes, Pid} ->
 3671:                       ok = SpawnRes,
 3672:                       true = is_pid(Pid),
 3673:                       Pid
 3674:               end,
 3675:     {links, [Tester]}
 3676:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [Spawned, links]),
 3677:     {monitored_by, [Tester]}
 3678:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [Spawned, monitored_by]),
 3679: 
 3680:     receive
 3681:         {'DOWN', AR3Mon, process, AliveReceiver3, ActualAR3XReason} ->
 3682:             AR3XReason = ActualAR3XReason
 3683:     end,
 3684: 
 3685:     unlink(AliveReceiver2),
 3686:     unlink(Spawned),
 3687: 
 3688:     true = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3689:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3690: 
 3691:     ok.
 3692: 
 3693: creation_selection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3694:     register(creation_selection_test_supervisor, self()),
 3695:     Name = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME) ++ "-"
 3696:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time()),
 3697:     Host = hostname(),
 3698:     Cmd = lists:append(
 3699:             [ct:get_progname(),
 3700:              " -noshell",
 3701:              " -setcookie ", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 3702:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 3703:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " ",
 3704:              " creation_selection_test ", atom_to_list(node()), " ",
 3705:              atom_to_list(net_kernel:longnames()), " ", Name, " ", Host]),
 3706:     ct:pal("Node command: ~p~n", [Cmd]),
 3707:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [exit_status]),
 3708:     Node = list_to_atom(lists:append([Name, "@", Host])),
 3709:     ok = receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node).
 3710: 
 3711: receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node) ->
 3712:     receive
 3713:         {creation_selection_test, Node, Creations, InvalidCreation,
 3714:          ClashResolvedCreation} = Msg ->
 3715:             ct:log("Test result: ~p~n", [Msg]),
 3716:             %% Verify that creation values are created as expected. The
 3717:             %% list of creations is in reverse start order...
 3718:             MaxC = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
 3719:             MinC = 4,
 3720:             StartOrderCreations = lists:reverse(Creations),
 3721:             InvalidCreation = lists:foldl(fun (C, C) when is_integer(C),
 3722:                                                           MinC =< C,
 3723:                                                           C =< MaxC ->
 3724:                                                   %% Return next expected
 3725:                                                   %% creation...
 3726:                                                   if C == MaxC -> MinC;
 3727:                                                      true -> C+1
 3728:                                                   end
 3729:                                           end,
 3730:                                           hd(StartOrderCreations),
 3731:                                           StartOrderCreations),
 3732:             false = lists:member(ClashResolvedCreation, [InvalidCreation
 3733:                                                         | Creations]),
 3734:             receive
 3735:                 {Port, {exit_status, 0}} ->
 3736:                     Port ! {self(), close},
 3737:                     ok;
 3738:                 {Port, {exit_status, EStat}} ->
 3739:                     ct:fail({"node exited abnormally: ", EStat})
 3740:             end;
 3741:         {Port, {exit_status, EStat}} ->
 3742:             ct:fail({"node prematurely exited: ", EStat});
 3743:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 3744:             ct:log("~ts", [Data]),
 3745:             receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node)
 3746:     end,
 3747:     ok.
 3748: 
 3749: creation_selection_test([TestSupNode, LongNames, Name, Host]) ->
 3750:     try
 3751:         StartArgs = [Name,
 3752:                      case LongNames of
 3753:                          true -> longnames;
 3754:                          false -> shortnames
 3755:                      end],
 3756:         Node = list_to_atom(lists:append([atom_to_list(Name),
 3757:                                           "@", atom_to_list(Host)])),
 3758:         GoDistributed = fun (F) ->
 3759:                                 {ok, _} = net_kernel:start(StartArgs),
 3760:                                 Node = node(),
 3761:                                 Creation = erlang:system_info(creation),
 3762:                                 _ = F(Creation),
 3763:                                 net_kernel:stop(),
 3764:                                 Creation
 3765:                         end,
 3766:         %% We start multiple times to verify that the creation values
 3767:         %% we get from epmd are delivered in sequence. This is a
 3768:         %% must for the test case such as it is written now, but can be
 3769:         %% changed. If changed, this test case must be updated...
 3770:         {Creations,
 3771:          LastCreation} = lists:foldl(fun (_, {Cs, _LC}) ->
 3772:                                              CFun = fun (X) -> X end,
 3773:                                              C = GoDistributed(CFun),
 3774:                                              {[C|Cs], C}
 3775:                                      end, {[], 0}, lists:seq(1, 5)),
 3776:         %% We create a pid with the creation that epmd will offer us the next
 3777:         %% time we start the distribution and then start the distribution
 3778:         %% once more. The node should avoid this creation, since this would
 3779:         %% cause external identifiers in the system with same
 3780:         %% nodename/creation pair as used by the local node, which in turn
 3781:         %% would cause these identifers not to work as expected. That is, the
 3782:         %% node should silently reject this creation and chose another one when
 3783:         %% starting the distribution.
 3784:         InvalidCreation = LastCreation+1,
 3785:         Pid = erts_test_utils:mk_ext_pid({Node, InvalidCreation}, 4711, 0),
 3786:         true = erts_debug:size(Pid) > 0, %% External pid
 3787:         ResultFun = fun (ClashResolvedCreation) ->
 3788:                             pong = net_adm:ping(TestSupNode),
 3789:                             Msg = {creation_selection_test, node(), Creations,
 3790:                                    InvalidCreation, ClashResolvedCreation},
 3791:                             {creation_selection_test_supervisor, TestSupNode}
 3792:                                 ! Msg,
 3793:                             %% Wait a bit so the message have time to get
 3794:                             %% through before we take down the distribution...
 3795:                             receive after 500 -> ok end
 3796:                     end,
 3797:         _ = GoDistributed(ResultFun),
 3798:         %% Ensure Pid is not garbage collected before starting the
 3799:         %% distribution...
 3800:         _ = id(Pid),
 3801:         erlang:halt(0)
 3802:     catch
 3803:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 3804:             erlang:display({Class, Reason, StackTrace}),
 3805:             erlang:halt(17)
 3806:     end.
 3807: 
 3808: %%% Utilities
 3809: 
 3810: id(X) ->
 3811:     X.
 3812: 
 3813: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3814:     wait_until(Fun, 24*60*60*1000).
 3815: 
 3816: wait_until(_Fun, Timeout) when Timeout < 0 ->
 3817:     timeout;
 3818: wait_until(Fun, Timeout) ->
 3819:     case catch Fun() of
 3820:         true ->
 3821:             ok;
 3822:         _ ->
 3823:             receive after 50 -> ok end,
 3824:             wait_until(Fun, Timeout-50)
 3825:     end.
 3826: 
 3827: timestamp() ->
 3828:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 3829: 
 3830: peer_stop(Peer, Node) ->
 3831:     verify_nc(Node),
 3832:     peer:stop(Peer).
 3833: 
 3834: verify_nc(Node) ->
 3835:     P = self(),
 3836:     Ref = make_ref(),
 3837:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 3838:                 fun() ->
 3839:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 3840:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 3841:                 end),
 3842:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 3843:     receive
 3844:         {Ref, ok} ->
 3845:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 3846:             ok;
 3847:         {Ref, Error} ->
 3848:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 3849:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 3850:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 3851:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 3852:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 3853:     end.
 3854: 
 3855: freeze_node(Node, MS) ->
 3856:     Own = 300,
 3857:     DoingIt = make_ref(),
 3858:     Freezer = self(),
 3859:     spawn_link(Node,
 3860:                fun () ->
 3861:                        dctrl_dop_send(Freezer, DoingIt),
 3862:                        receive after Own -> ok end,
 3863:                        set_internal_state(block, MS+Own)
 3864:                end),
 3865:     receive DoingIt -> ok end,
 3866:     receive after Own -> ok end.
 3867: 
 3868: start_node_monitors(Nodes) ->
 3869:     Master = self(),
 3870:     lists:foreach(fun (Node) ->
 3871:                           spawn(Node,
 3872:                                 fun () ->
 3873:                                         node_monitor(Master)
 3874:                                 end)
 3875:                   end,
 3876:                   Nodes),
 3877:     ok.
 3878: 
 3879: node_monitor(Master) ->
 3880:     Opts = [nodedown_reason,{node_type,all}],
 3881:     Nodes0 = nodes(connected),
 3882:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, Opts),
 3883:     Nodes1 = nodes(connected),
 3884:     case lists:sort(Nodes0) == lists:sort(Nodes1) of
 3885:         true ->
 3886:             lists:foreach(fun (Node) ->
 3887:                                   Master ! {nodeup, node(), Node}
 3888:                           end,
 3889:                           Nodes0),
 3890:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Nodes0]),
 3891:             node_monitor_loop(Master);
 3892:         false ->
 3893:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, Opts),
 3894:             flush_node_changes(),
 3895:             node_monitor(Master)
 3896:     end.
 3897: 
 3898: flush_node_changes() ->
 3899:     receive
 3900:         {NodeChange, _Node, _InfoList} when NodeChange == nodeup;
 3901:                                             NodeChange == nodedown ->
 3902:             flush_node_changes()
 3903:     after 0 ->
 3904:               ok
 3905:     end.
 3906: 
 3907: node_monitor_loop(Master) ->
 3908:     receive
 3909:         {nodeup, Node, _InfoList} = Msg ->
 3910:             Master ! {nodeup, node(), Node},
 3911:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Msg]),
 3912:             node_monitor_loop(Master);
 3913:         {nodedown, Node, InfoList} = Msg ->
 3914:             Reason = case lists:keysearch(nodedown_reason, 1, InfoList) of
 3915:                          {value, {nodedown_reason, R}} -> R;
 3916:                          _ -> undefined
 3917:                      end,
 3918:             Master ! {nodedown, node(), Node, Reason},
 3919:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Msg]),
 3920:             node_monitor_loop(Master)
 3921:     end.
 3922: 
 3923: verify_up(A, B) ->
 3924:     receive {nodeup, A, B} -> ok end,
 3925:     receive {nodeup, B, A} -> ok end.
 3926: 
 3927: verify_still_up(A, B) ->
 3928:     true = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 3929:     true = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 3930:     verify_no_down(A, B).
 3931: 
 3932: verify_no_down(A, B) ->
 3933:     receive
 3934:         {nodedown, A, B, _} = Msg0 ->
 3935:             ct:fail(Msg0)
 3936:     after 0 ->
 3937:               ok
 3938:     end,
 3939:     receive
 3940:         {nodedown, B, A, _} = Msg1 ->
 3941:             ct:fail(Msg1)
 3942:     after 0 ->
 3943:               ok
 3944:     end.
 3945: 
 3946: %% verify_down(A, B) ->
 3947: %%     receive {nodedown, A, B, _} -> ok end,
 3948: %%     receive {nodedown, B, A, _} -> ok end.
 3949: 
 3950: verify_down(A, ReasonA, B, ReasonB) ->
 3951:     receive
 3952:         {nodedown, A, B, _} = Msg0 ->
 3953:             {nodedown, A, B, ReasonA} = Msg0
 3954:     end,
 3955:     receive
 3956:         {nodedown, B, A, _} = Msg1 ->
 3957:             {nodedown, B, A, ReasonB} = Msg1
 3958:     end,
 3959:     ok.
 3960: 
 3961: hostname() ->
 3962:     from($@, atom_to_list(node())).
 3963: 
 3964: from(H, [H | T]) -> T;
 3965: from(H, [_ | T]) -> from(H, T);
 3966: from(_, []) -> [].

 3972: %%     spawn_link(erlang, apply, [Fun, Args]).
 3973: 
 3974: until(Fun) ->
 3975:     case Fun() of
 3976:         true ->
 3977:             ok;
 3978:         false ->
 3979:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 3980:             until(Fun)
 3981:     end.
 3982: 
 3983: forever(Fun) ->
 3984:     Fun(),
 3985:     forever(Fun).

 3988: %%     set_internal_state(abort, Why).

 3990: 
 3991: start_busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 3992:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun () -> busy_dist_port_tracer() end),
 3993:     erlang:system_monitor(Tracer, [busy_dist_port]),
 3994:     Tracer.
 3995: 
 3996: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(Tracer) when is_pid(Tracer) ->
 3997:     unlink(Tracer),
 3998:     exit(Tracer, bye);
 3999: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(_) ->
 4000:     true.
 4001: 
 4002: busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 4003:     receive
 4004:         {monitor, _SuspendedProcess, busy_dist_port, _Port} = M ->
 4005:             erlang:display(M),
 4006:             busy_dist_port_tracer()
 4007:     end.
 4008: 
 4009: repeat(_Fun, 0) ->
 4010:     ok;
 4011: repeat(Fun, N) ->
 4012:     Fun(),
 4013:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 4014: 
 4015: string_to_atom_ext(String) ->
 4016:     Utf8List = string_to_utf8_list(String),
 4017:     Len = length(Utf8List),
 4018:     case Len < 256 of
 4019:         true ->
 4020:             [?SMALL_ATOM_UTF8_EXT, Len | Utf8List];
 4021:         false ->
 4022:             [?ATOM_UTF8_EXT, Len bsr 8, Len band 16#ff | Utf8List]
 4023:     end.
 4024: 
 4025: string_to_atom(String) ->
 4026:     binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC
 4027:                                    | string_to_atom_ext(String)])).
 4028: 
 4029: string_to_utf8_list([]) ->
 4030:     [];
 4031: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4032:                                    0 =< CP,
 4033:                                    CP =< 16#7F ->
 4034:     [CP | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 4035: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4036:                                    16#80 =< CP,
 4037:                                    CP =< 16#7FF ->
 4038:     [16#C0 bor (CP bsr 6),
 4039:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4040:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 4041: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4042:                                    16#800 =< CP,
 4043:                                    CP =< 16#FFFF ->
 4044:     [16#E0 bor (CP bsr 12),
 4045:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 6)),
 4046:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4047:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 4048: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4049:                                    16#10000 =< CP,
 4050:                                    CP =< 16#10FFFF ->
 4051:     [16#F0 bor (CP bsr 18),
 4052:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 12)),
 4053:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 6)),
 4054:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4055:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)].
 4056: 
 4057: mk_pid({NodeName, Creation}, Number, Serial) when is_atom(NodeName) ->
 4058:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4059:     mk_pid({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial);
 4060: mk_pid({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial) ->
 4061:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4062:                                               ?PID_EXT,
 4063:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4064:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4065:                                               uint32_be(Serial),
 4066:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4067:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 4068:             Pid;
 4069:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4070:             exit({badarg, mk_pid, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial]});
 4071:         Other ->
 4072:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4073:     end.
 4074: 
 4075: mk_port({NodeName, Creation}, Number) when is_atom(NodeName) ->
 4076:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4077:     mk_port({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number);
 4078: mk_port({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number) ->
 4079:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4080:                                               ?PORT_EXT,
 4081:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4082:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4083:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4084:         Port when is_port(Port) ->
 4085:             Port;
 4086:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4087:             exit({badarg, mk_port, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number]});
 4088:         Other ->
 4089:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4090:     end.
 4091: 
 4092: mk_ref({NodeName, Creation}, [Number] = NL) when is_atom(NodeName),
 4093:                                                  is_integer(Creation),
 4094:                                                  is_integer(Number) ->
 4095:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4096:     mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, NL);
 4097: mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, [Number]) when is_integer(Creation),
 4098:                                                is_integer(Number) ->
 4099:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4100:                                               ?REFERENCE_EXT,
 4101:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4102:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4103:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4104:         Ref when is_reference(Ref) ->
 4105:             Ref;
 4106:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4107:             exit({badarg, mk_ref, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, [Number]]});
 4108:         Other ->
 4109:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4110:     end;
 4111: mk_ref({NodeName, Creation}, Numbers) when is_atom(NodeName),
 4112:                                            is_integer(Creation),
 4113:                                            is_list(Numbers) ->
 4114:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4115:     mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers);
 4116: mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers) when is_integer(Creation),
 4117:                                               is_list(Numbers) ->
 4118:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4119:                                               ?NEW_REFERENCE_EXT,
 4120:                                               uint16_be(length(Numbers)),
 4121:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4122:                                               uint8(Creation),
 4123:                                               lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4124:                                                                 uint32_be(N)
 4125:                                                         end,
 4126:                                                         Numbers)])) of
 4127:         Ref when is_reference(Ref) ->
 4128:             Ref;
 4129:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4130:             exit({badarg, mk_ref, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers]});
 4131:         Other ->
 4132:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4133:     end.
 4134: 
 4135: uint64_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 64 ->
 4136:     [(Uint bsr 56) band 16#ff,
 4137:      (Uint bsr 48) band 16#ff,
 4138:      (Uint bsr 40) band 16#ff,
 4139:      (Uint bsr 32) band 16#ff,
 4140:      (Uint bsr 24) band 16#ff,
 4141:      (Uint bsr 16) band 16#ff,
 4142:      (Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4143:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4144: uint64_be(Uint) ->
 4145:     exit({badarg, uint64_be, [Uint]}).
 4146: 
 4147: uint32_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 32 ->
 4148:     [(Uint bsr 24) band 16#ff,
 4149:      (Uint bsr 16) band 16#ff,
 4150:      (Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4151:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4152: uint32_be(Uint) ->
 4153:     exit({badarg, uint32_be, [Uint]}).
 4154: 
 4155: 
 4156: uint16_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 16 ->
 4157:     [(Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4158:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4159: uint16_be(Uint) ->
 4160:     exit({badarg, uint16_be, [Uint]}).
 4161: 
 4162: uint8(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 8 ->
 4163:     Uint band 16#ff;
 4164: uint8(Uint) ->
 4165:     exit({badarg, uint8, [Uint]}).
 4166: 
 4167: free_memory() ->
 4168:     %% Free memory in MB.
 4169:     try
 4170: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 4171: 	{value, {free_memory, Free}} = lists:keysearch(free_memory, 1, SMD),
 4172: 	TotFree = (Free +
 4173: 		   case lists:keysearch(cached_memory, 1, SMD) of
 4174: 		       {value, {cached_memory, Cached}} -> Cached;
 4175: 		       false -> 0
 4176: 		   end +
 4177: 		   case lists:keysearch(buffered_memory, 1, SMD) of
 4178: 		       {value, {buffered_memory, Buffed}} -> Buffed;
 4179: 		       false -> 0
 4180: 		   end),
 4181: 	TotFree div (1024*1024)
 4182:     catch
 4183: 	error : undef ->
 4184: 	    ct:fail({"os_mon not built"})
 4185:     end.
